```{r}
library(pacman)
p_load(ggplot2, magick)
p_load_gh('thomasp85/patchwork')
images <- list(logo = logo, wizard = wizard, rose = rose, granite = granite)
```

# 

# `image_ggplot()` のコード

```{r}
image_ggplot
```

`coord_fixed()` してくれているので安心ですね．

```{r}
images %>%
  lapply(image_info) %>%
  bind_rows(.id = 'name')
```




```{r}
images %>%
  lapply(image_ggplot) %>%
  wrap_plots() +
  plot_annotation(tag_levels = 'a')
```
